connect.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect?
connect.title: CONNECTED SERVICES

deleteRequest.tips: Please note that deleting your account is irreversible. Once the account is deleted, all your data, including profile information and projects will be PERMANENTLY removed from our system.
deleteRequest.title: DELETE ACCOUNT

deleteRequestConfirm.tips:
Your account will be permanently deleted after 30 days.
If you change your mind and want to keep your account, please log in within 30 days to cancel the deletion process. Once the 30 days has passed, your account will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. Please make sure to backup any relevant data in advance.
deleteRequestConfirm.title: Are you sure you want to delete the account?

deleteRequestRevert.tips: After submitting the application, you can still access Cocrea normally within 30 days and revoke the delete operation at any time during this period. After 30 days, it will be permanently deleted.
deleteRequestRevert.title: DEACTIVATE ACCOUNT

domain.title: DOMAIN
domain.URLdesc: Username is used on your page URL

changePassword.easyGuess: Please enter a password between 6-20 characters, containing both letters and numbers.

newEmail.desc1: Enter a new email address and we'll send you a 4-digit code to confirm it belongs to you and keep your account secure.
newEmail.title: Update email address

validationDialog.desc: We sent a 4-digit code to {{email}}. Please input the 4-digit code to keep your account secure.
validationDialog.title: Email Validation

birthday.tip: For the protection of minors, age information will be used to filter out projects that are not suitable for children under the age of 13 to play.
birthday.title: What is your birthday?
